== Blood smear ==
=> Activated mononuclear cells, characterised by a ''large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm = polymorphic cells, sometimes'' described as ''atypical'' = activated T lymphocytes.

=> Absence of blast cells

=> Other haematopoietic lineages are normal.

question.question: Which of the following is a characteristic of a blood smear in mononucleosis syndrome?
question.option_c: Activated mononuclear cells with large size and hyperbasophilic cytoplasm
question.option_d: Increased number of red blood cells
